Item.ItemVisibleToAll: This item will be visible to all users.
Item.ItemInSalesStatus: In sales status, the item can be sold.
Item.ItemHiddenFromContent: This item will be hidden from the content page.
Item.ItemAvailableForSale: Item will be available for sale.
Item.ItemPublishedAndAvailable: Item will be published and available.
Item.ItemDisplayedButSold: Item will be displayed but sold.
Item.ItemPublishedAndSold: Item will be published and sold.
Item.ItemVisibleAgain: This item will be visible again.

ItemDetail.OnlyZero: Only “0” can be set for now
ItemDetail.CheckBoxMaxLimit: Please check the box if you do not want to set a maximum limit.
ItemDetail.LicenseNotation: Please enter the license notation in this field. ex) 'CC0' or detailed license information.
ItemDetail.PublishedVisible: Once published, this item will be visible to all users.
ItemDetail.SettingsImmutable: Settings cannot be changed afterward (except for price).
ItemDetail.SalesStatus: In sales status, the item can be sold and distributed.
ItemDetail.SelectSalesStatus: If intended for sale/distribution, please select the sales status (On Sale).
ItemDetail.CannotRevertPrivate: You cannot revert to private status.
ItemDetail.PublishedForSale: The item will be published and available for sale and distribution.
ItemDetail.HiddenContentPage: This item will be hidden from the content page.
ItemDetail.AvailableForSale: The item will be available for sale and distribution.
ItemDetail.DisplayedButSold: The item will continue to be displayed to all users, but it will be sold or distributed.
ItemDetail.VisibleToAll: This item will once again be visible to all users.
ItemDetail.PublishedAndForSale: The item will be published and will also be available for sale and distribution.
ItemDetail.RequiredFieldsMissing: There are required fields that have not been filled. Please check.

Actions: Use that violates public order and morals.
Use that significantly damages the image of our company, products, or characters.
Use that harms or could potentially harm the social reputation of the author of the work being used.
Use that infringes or could potentially infringe the rights of others.
Use that creates or could create the misconception that we support or endorse specific individuals, political parties, religious organizations, etc.
Copying or reproducing works without adding substantial modifications is considered “replication” and is prohibited.
License.ModificationRequest: If you want to make changes, please modify them under 'Copyright.'
License.InvalidStatusChange: Status change invalid: Cannot change to the same status.

ContentBrand.ImageGuidelines: For best results, use an image that is at least 320x100 pixels and no more than 4MB in size. Accepted file formats are PNG, JPEG, or GIF (non-animated).
ContentBrand.MerchandiseImageGuidelines: For best results, use an image that is at least 500x500 pixels and no more than 4MB in size. Accepted file formats are PNG or GIF (non-animated).

ContentSettings.ContentNameChangeGuidelines: The content name can be changed once every three months. After the change, the content name visible to users will be updated once the review is completed.
ContentSettings.contentNameChangeRequest:
The content name change request is currently under review. 
Once approved, the name will be updated. Additionally, after the change, it cannot be modified again for three months.
ContentSettings.NameChangeRequest: Submitted a request to change the content name!
ContentSettings.NameChangeCompletion: The name will be changed once the review is completed. Please note that the review process may take up to one week.
ContentSettings.ChangeContentNameGuidelines: You can change the name of the content. A review is required after the change, and if approved, the name will be updated. Once changed, the name cannot be modified again for 3 months.
ContentSettings.EditDescription: You can freely edit the description of the content.
ContentSettings.SetDefaultLicense: Set the default license for each DigitalItem record.
ContentSettings.SetDefaultCopyrightHolders: Set the default copyright holders for each DigitalItem record. You can enter this like tags, and no re-review is required for this change.
ContentSettings.DiscardChanges: Do you want to discard the changes?

Showcase.DeleteSelectingItem: Delete a selecting Item from Showcase
Showcase.MintFailedLimitExceeded: Mint failed because the daily transaction limit was exceeded.
Showcase.PreviewDisplayed: The 3D preview will be displayed here when an item is selected.
Showcase.ConfirmMint: Are you sure you want to mint?
Showcase.MintOperationWarning: Performing the Mint operation will disable the ability to undo

Showcase.ReusableComponents: Re-usable components built using Figr Design System

GiftReceivingSettings.TogglePermission: On this page, you can toggle the permission settings for receiving gifts. Adjust the settings for each inventory or box.
GiftReceivingSettings.DeleteBoxWarning: When you delete a BOX, the digital items (NFTs) contained within the BOX are also deleted. Please make sure to check the contents of the BOX carefully before proceeding with this action.
GiftReceivingSettings.BoxNameTooLong: The box name is too long.
GiftReceivingSettings.QrCodeSaveInstruction: You can save the QR code by clicking on it.
GiftReceivingSettings.QrCodeCloseInstruction: To close this screen, please click outside the QR code.

Workspace.ItemGeneratorDescription: This generator allows you to easily create original items. Use your favorite designs to create acrylic stands, posters, message cards, and more. With intuitive controls, you can craft unique items that are truly your own.
Workspace.CreateAcrylicStand: Create your own acrylic stand with your favorite designs.
Workspace.CreatePoster: Create an original poster with captivating visuals.
Workspace.CreateMessageCard: Create a personalized message card with a special touch.
Workspace.CreateCanBadge: Create an original can badge. Ideal for promotions or as collectible items.
Workspace.Upload3DModel: Upload your 3D model and create a digital item.
Workspace.SelectPosterMaterial: Select the material for the poster.
Workspace.CropPosterMaterial: Crop the poster material as needed.
Workspace.SelectAcrylicStandBodyMaterial: Select the material for the acrylic stand body.
Workspace.AdjustBodyTilt: Adjust the tilt of the body by rotating it.
Workspace.SelectAcrylicStandBaseMaterial: Select the material for the acrylic stand base.
Workspace.SetBaseOrientation: Set the front and back of the base and adjust it by rotating.
Workspace.PlaceBodyOnBase: Place the body on the base. Move the rectangle labeled 'Acrylic plate' to set the placement.
Workspace.SelectKeychainDesign: Select the design for the acrylic keychain.
Workspace.SelectCanBadgeMaterial: Select the material for the Can Badge.
Workspace.CropBadge: Crop the can badge material as needed.
Workspace.SelectMessageCardSheetMaterial: Select the sheet material for the message card.
Workspace.SelectMessageCardTextMaterial: Select the text material for the message card.
Workspace.AdjustTextPosition: Adjust the position and size of the text.
Workspace.CombineSheetAndText: Combine the sheet and text to generate a single item.
Workspace.ConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
Workspace.DeleteOperationWarning: Performing the Delete operation will disable the ability to undo or redo any previous changes. Please confirm that you want to proceed.
Workspace.ConfirmResetSettings: Are you sure you want to reset the settings?
Workspace.Creator: Creator
Workspace.AdjustAcrylicRatio: You can adjust the ratio of the selected Acrylic Stand.

TCP.SubmitSingleDocument: Please submit only one document here. Additional documents can be submitted or modified later.
